hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: I'll put her on prednisone vs methylprednisolone vs hydrocortisone Google has never consciously built such a culture. And now it seems that the company’s 20% time was not part of a freedom-of-initiative culture, but a perk. Google has a legendary collection of those, from free gourmet food to, nowadays, a death perk: As Chief People Officer Laszlo Bock explained to Forbes last year, an employee’s surviving spouse gets a 10-year pay package, with all stock vested immediately, while any children receive $1,000 monthly until 19 (or 23 if a student).
